# Press Release Details

## 

Hydrofarm Holdings Group, Inc. to Announce Third Quarter 2024 Results on November 7, 2024

October 24, 2024 

[PDF Version](/node/9271/pdf)

SHOEMAKERSVILLE, Pa., Oct. 24, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hydrofarm Holdings Group, Inc. (“Hydrofarm” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: HYFM), a leading independent manufacturer and distributor of branded hydroponics equipment and supplies for controlled environment agriculture (“CEA”), today announced that it will host a conference call to review third quarter 2024 results on Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 8:30 AM ET. A press release containing third quarter 2024 results will be issued before market open that same day.

The conference call can be accessed live over the phone by dialing 1-800-343-5172 and entering the conference ID: HYFMQ3. The conference call will also be webcast live and archived on the corporate website at [www.hydrofarm.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=oEaMiNtiMEO0HKTdNqaosPmRnnvXScPXhuFul08pRlXqAWfSo8FwvVFlnhGeWRf5ZMhqxuTjQIei8zp5YlFCDn0wnQCJjui5JWOcngeIGAo=), under the “Investors” section.

**About Hydrofarm Holdings Group, Inc.** Hydrofarm is a leading independent manufacturer and distributor of branded hydroponics equipment and supplies for controlled environment agriculture, including grow lights, climate control solutions, growing media and nutrients, as well as a broad portfolio of innovative and proprietary branded products. For over 40 years, Hydrofarm has helped growers make growing easier and more productive. The Company’s mission is to empower growers, farmers and cultivators with products that enable greater quality, efficiency, consistency, and speed in their grow projects.

**Contacts:****Investor Contact** Anna Kate Heller / ICR[ir@hydrofarm.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=atGuPkVN4XHxrvXj7zj9vS3fVa4_d--BDoPkIR1tDqV8ehItK7ZegRwSdHcqMtxBBVWWTDA61Pk1XoSh_GPekQa5rkph_cggkOt3ighmHKKIR8df0b77aYBeNU02eVqn6SMtkmQGebvVnUplqF35irDV41nV1aWyU7zLDSM1Ydp5yRrH12bvGBJtJFViYWLIAtU_jvgIOHPFaHbGO5ev08FZJASQqRDqbN1G8mHoZjc=)

![](https://ml.globenewswire.com/media/YTUyMTFlMjYtNzljZC00NDljLWEyNWItYWEzZTZhZWE5OGNlLTEyMTQ4NDI=/tiny/Hydrofarm-Holdings-Group-Inc-.png)
